This restaurant makes my tounge and my heart do the tango. What amazing pasta!! The texture, the mixture of flavors, cooked to perfection... life doesnt get much better than this! Oh! Did I mention that we had a three course meal plus drinks for two people for under 20 Euros!!! What?! You say!!?? Yes, that's right, take your family (totally kid friendly) or your lover to this amazing restaurant and no one will be disappointed. I reccomend the pasta rellena and cheesecake, but all options are excellent :)I almost forgot to mention, there is AC so you can have a break from the summer heat :)
